<a id="BackBufferCopy"></a>

# BackBufferCopy

**Inherits:** [Node2D](Node2D.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A node that copies a region of the screen to a buffer for access in shader code.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Node for back-buffering the currently-displayed screen. The region defined in the **BackBufferCopy** node is buffered with the content of the screen it covers, or the entire screen according to the [copy_mode](BackBufferCopy.md#BackBufferCopy_property_copy_mode). It can be accessed in shader scripts using the screen texture (i.e. a uniform sampler with ``hint_screen_texture``).

\ **Note:** Since this node inherits from [Node2D](Node2D.md) (and not [Control](Control.md)), anchors and margins won't apply to child [Control](Control.md)-derived nodes. This can be problematic when resizing the window. To avoid this, add [Control](Control.md)-derived nodes as *siblings* to the **BackBufferCopy** node instead of adding them as children.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Screen-reading shaders](../tutorials/shaders/screen-reading_shaders.md)

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_BackBufferCopy_CopyMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **CopyMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_BackBufferCopy_CopyMode)

<a id="BackBufferCopy_constant_COPY_MODE_DISABLED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CopyMode](BackBufferCopy.md#enum_BackBufferCopy_CopyMode) **COPY_MODE_DISABLED** = `0`

Disables the buffering mode. This means the **BackBufferCopy** node will directly use the portion of screen it covers.<a id="BackBufferCopy_constant_COPY_MODE_RECT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CopyMode](BackBufferCopy.md#enum_BackBufferCopy_CopyMode) **COPY_MODE_RECT** = `1`

**BackBufferCopy** buffers a rectangular region.<a id="BackBufferCopy_constant_COPY_MODE_VIEWPORT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CopyMode](BackBufferCopy.md#enum_BackBufferCopy_CopyMode) **COPY_MODE_VIEWPORT** = `2`

**BackBufferCopy** buffers the entire screen.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<a id="BackBufferCopy_property_rect"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Rect2](Rect2.md) **rect** = `Rect2(-100, -100, 200, 200)` [ðŸ”—](#BackBufferCopy_property_rect)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_rect**\ (\ value\: [Rect2](Rect2.md)\ )
